Name: Shining Balloon Riding
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a very fast speed while riding a Shining Balloon, which enables High Altitude Flight.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a very fast speed while riding a Shining balloon that enables High Flight. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Autopilot is available only in Victoria Island and some other continents. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvine.) Press the Jump key to use the booster while in Star Planet.
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a very fast speed while riding a Shining Balloon, which enables High Altitude Flight.
